TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mark_Alarie, title = Mark_Alarie, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Alarie} }

S.FORM: Mark Alarie sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, pzyang pkaki' tay kska', wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1963, ryax sa tay 11 nqu tay 12, Mark Alarie, squliq na p'unro.
